round_best: Develop a dynamic residual connection framework where the weight of the residual path is adaptively adjusted based on the progression of training epochs and the detected variance in gradient flow through the network. This approach could utilize reinforcement learning to optimize the contribution of residual connections, minimizing the seesaw effect by selectively strengthening or weakening these connections based on real-time feedback from the training process. Such a model can maintain efficient gradient propagation and improve convergence rates, particularly in very deep architectures.
